name: Celtic Tribes - Building Strategy MMO
description:
Celtic Tribes - Real-time strategy for true chiefs

Peaceful settlers as well as the battle hungry conquerors will have lots of fun in this epic MMO. You decide whether you expand your realm peacefully or using your military expertise in glorious battles!


Features:

- Free to play
- Build your village into a large city
- Recruit a mighty army and fight against thousands of other tribal leaders
- Collect and combine several secret artefacts and utilize their power
- Use the magic of mysterious druids and let your enemies freeze in fear
- Produce crucial resources and become wealthy through trading
- Prove your strategic skills in conquering and defending the villages 
- Join forces with other chiefs in powerful tribes
- Perform exciting missions with special rewards
- Relive the age of the Celts and the beautifully designed graphics of Celtic Tribes


From a village to an empire
You start off with a small Celtic village in the green lands of Gaul. But do not get fooled - the beautiful land is anything but peaceful and the war is coming. The other tribes already have their eyes on your village. Some are looking for a new conquest, some search for a new trading partner and others simply want to welcome you in their tribe.

Strategy is crucial
Your Celtic village can only survive if you raise an army and get ready for battle. War is known as an alternative means of diplomacy and you are not the only chief aiming to establish an empire. It is only by working together with your tribe, can you ensure the success of your conquests and win the war for the throne.

Use the Magic
Magic runes support your army in battle. Your druids do not only reside in your village. They can also use the power of ancient magic to help you.

The power of the tribes
Your tribe can rule the world! Unite your armies and let all of Gaul tremble. No battle is too great, no conquest is impossible. Work together and every empire will contribute to creating your realm.

The throne of the world
Create a throne and rule over the world in the ancient age of the Celts. You will need the support of your tribe, a powerful army and fierce determination of a true leader. The support of your druids and their magic will not hurt either.


Download the app for free now and experience exciting adventures in the ancient age in Celtic Tribes - the captivating strategy MMOG.
